name: Idle Citadel
description:
Develop your citadel and conquer the world with your heroes!

Idle Citadel is a semi-automatic game. You prepare and optimize a conquest without direct control that you can influence in real time.

At the same time, make your winnings grow by improving your citadel and play mini-games to accumulate even more winnings!

Summon and train your heroes

Thousands of items to collect during conquest, missions and other citadel activities.

You can also build your own arsenal to equip your heroes.
